page.title: 15Tollerton Show/Education
page.content:
Mary, 15th August. Tollerton Horticulutral Society now hold their Annual Show on the Saturday nearest to 15th August. Tollerton Methodist School was built in 1857.The foundation stone was laid on the 3rd July.It was opened on the 11th January,1858.94 pupils were admitted on that day.The money required for building was given, partly by the Government(Â£400-8s). The people of Tollerton, mostly Methodists gave the rest.Bricks were led from a local brickyard to the school site.
At present there are 28 children on roll.There two classes,an Infant class (4-7 years) and a Junior class (7-11 years).The Headteacher teaches the Juniors.There is a full-time Infant teacher and a part-time teacher who helps in both classes.There are two
